activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#6318
activity.text:
Hi @nihal467 
I have run the Cypress tests locally. 

The "Create a New consultation to existing patient" test is failing. 

It expects "Doctor Dev" in the "Treating Physician" field. But only "rocky sharma" exists in the dropdown. 

I am also attaching the screenshots. 
![Patient Creation with consultation -- Create a New consultation to existing patient (failed) (attempt 3)](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/assets/13254850/5bc474d2-d2e8-43af-be53-31166efce539)

![image](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/assets/13254850/08b4523c-3017-4da4-b1e8-39d73c01079a)
